content: the round 16 sts round 6 k2tog to end of the round 8 sts break yarn leaving a 15 cm 6 inch tail thread tail through remain sts and pull snugly to close top weave in all ends special instruction k3tog yo k3tog into the same 3 sts step1 k3tog step2 yo step3 k3tog knit 3 stitches together but bring yarn forward and knit same 3 stitches together don t drop them from left around a needle again and drop off left hand hand needle needle copyright © 87cafe 2011 http //cafe 87note net all rights reserved this pattern is for personal and non-profit use only
